|ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 94:44:52 |oui = 94:44:52 |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = SuperTask!;;; |exp_if_types = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 9 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 3 |pwr_barrel_len = 10.5 |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, internal,, Arcadyan type1 pinout,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, J2 |jtag = yes,, probably,, U5 |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Richwave;RTC6691;187, 6691, A951;2; |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.2.1 |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = Belkin.XXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^Belkin.[0-9A-F]{4}$ |default_ch = |manuf = Arcadyan |manuf_model = WG7005E22 |manuf_rev = 2-LF-AK |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 02/12/2010 |estreldate = 03/24/2010 |estprice = |upc = 722868757307 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = B003CJTNJ0 |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = none |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Silkscreened text... *"P/N: 141700520021J R0B" appears to be silkscreened on the main board. *"P/N: 141700520021J R01" is silkscreened on a production model board. The default SSID is '''Belkin.XXXX''' where '''XXXX''' appears to '''3''' followed by the last three :hex digits of the wireless interface MAC address (though this could be incorrect). An example SSID is '''Belkin.336D''' with MAC 94:44:52:1E:93:6D. ===PSU=== The power adapter included with the router is a HXY-090V1330A (9V/1A). :ID/OD/Len measurements are approximate. ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== Presumably the following standard '''Arcadyan''' pinout... 
(3.3) (GND)
(   ) (   )
(   ) (TxD)
(   ) (RxD)
(   ) [   ]
J2
====Info derived from==== {{/Serial info}} [[Category:English Documentation]]
